chapters.title: Chapter 7: The Way Out of the Mountains
chapters.info: Mandarb, p. 101 (75)—The black stallion that Lan rides. Zarine tries to assume this name since it means “Blade,” and she thinks it a proper name for a Hunter of the Horn. She decided against it when Perrin told her that Lan's horse was named Mandarb. See Bashere, Faile; Bashere, Zarine.
